data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Australian educational Departments and organizations, as do other sectors affected by the changes in media and communications, need to start accepting that there are considerable cultural changes taking place around them that are affecting the fundamental understandings with which they operate. Educational ____ and ____ would ____ well ____ begin ____ exit ____ from ____ content ____ models ____ online ____ ( Morrison, 2005 ), and ____ investing ____ digital ____ programs ____ sustained ____ research. The goal should be to set in motion a continuous and sustained development cycle focused on enabling, supporting and encouraging the use of free software, social media, open education and research and networked learning practices.
data.partBlankContent: Australian educational Departments and organizations, as do other sectors affected by the changes in media and communications, need to start accepting that there are considerable cultural changes taking place around them that are affecting the fundamental understandings with which they operate. Educational depar______ and organi_______ would d_ well t_ begin implem______ exit strat_____ from prev____ content cen____ models o_ online lear____ ( Morrison, 2005 ), and st___ investing i_ digital lite____ programs a__ sustained partic_______ research. The goal should be to set in motion a continuous and sustained development cycle focused on enabling, supporting and encouraging the use of free software, social media, open education and research and networked learning practices.
data.fullContent: Australian educational Departments and organizations, as do other sectors affected by the changes in media and communications, need to start accepting that there are considerable cultural changes taking place around them that are affecting the fundamental understandings with which they operate. Educational departments and organizations would do well to begin implementing exit strategies from previous content centric models of online learning ( Morrison, 2005 ), and start investing in digital literacy programs and sustained participatory research. The goal should be to set in motion a continuous and sustained development cycle focused on enabling, supporting and encouraging the use of free software, social media, open education and research and networked learning practices.
data.answer: 澳大利亚的教育部门和组织，以及其他受媒体和通讯变化影响的部门，需要开始接受他们周围正在发生的重大文化变化，这些变化正在影响他们运作的基本理解。教育部门和组织应该开始从以前的在线学习的以内容为中心的模式中实施退出战略(Morrison, 2005)，并开始投资于数字扫盲计划和持续的参与式研究。我们的目标应该是启动一个持续的发展周期，重点是促进、支持和鼓励使用自由软件、社交媒体、开放教育、研究和网络学习实践。
